(family) †
Coccocephalichthys Whitley 1940
[ type genus inferred from the stem, Art. 11.7.1.1; junior objective synonym †Cocconiscidae Romer 1945 , invalid, Art. 61.3.2, but name in prevailing recent practice Art. 40.2; family name sometimes seen as †Coccocephalichthidae]
